notes: All text content preserved accurately. Five paragraphs correctly identified. Style attributes lost but not critical.
Text content present but all heading levels (h1-h6) are converted to paragraphs. Semantic structure completely lost.
Text mostly present but some formatting context lost. Bold partially detected but incorrectly applied. Em, underline, strikethrough, code, and mark tags are all lost.
Text content complete with bullet characters preserved. However, ul/li structure is lost - converted to paragraphs. Bullets visible but semantic list structure missing.
Text content degraded - all items merged into single paragraph. Ordered list structure completely lost. Numbers present but structure unrecognizable.
Text content preserved. All nesting hierarchy lost - converted to flat paragraphs. Bullets and numbers show level existence but hierarchical structure completely missing.
Text content complete. Definition list structure lost - terms and definitions converted to paragraphs. Visual separation exists but semantic dl/dt/dd elements gone.
Complete failure - empty output. Table detection entirely failed. All content lost.
Text content present in single paragraph. Table structure and colspan semantics completely lost. Data exists but no table markup or organization.
Text content present in single paragraph. Table structure and rowspan semantics completely lost. Data readable but no table markup or cell relationships.
Table with colspan/rowspan converted to plain paragraphs. All structural semantics lost.
Nested lists in table cells flattened to text. No table or list structure preserved.
Nested table structure completely lost. All content flattened to paragraphs with minimal hierarchy.
Text fully preserved but all img tags missing. Inline image semantic meaning lost.
Caption text preserved but figure/figcaption semantic elements lost. Images likely missing too.
All text extracted including attributions, but blockquote semantic element and styling lost.
Text complete but all code/kbd/var semantic elements stripped. Formatting completely lost.
Code text present but multi-line structure lost. Pre/code blocks converted to paragraphs.
Text complete including headers/footers but not identified as marginal content. Structure confused.
Text complete but footnote semantic elements lost. Superscript formatting missing.
Text content present but polluted with watermark repetitions interspersed throughout. Watermark should be filtered as design element, not extracted as content.
All text extracted correctly with icons preserved. Semantic callout structure (warning/danger divs) lost, rendered as plain paragraphs. Icon emoji formatting retained.
Text content complete. Icons/emojis preserved. CSS-styled callout boxes not recovered semantically; all content flattened to paragraphs.
All text present but column order is mixed/interleaved. Reading order is by vertical position, not column-first. Column layout structure not recovered.
Text content complete but severely interleaved across columns. Reading order incorrect, making content difficult to follow logically. No column structure recovered.
Pull quote correctly identified as h3 (larger font), distinguishing it from body text. Quote content and main text both preserved. Structure partially recovered via heading markup.
All text extracted. Sidebar content interleaved with main content by position. Semantic aside/sidebar structure not recovered. Reading order disrupted.
Drop cap 'T' extracted as separate h1, splitting paragraph awkwardly. Text complete but formatting misrepresented. Semantic drop-cap styling not recovered.
TOC text fully extracted with leader dots and page numbers intact. Flat paragraph structure; semantic TOC links/list structure not recovered. Visual formatting (dots) preserved.

Text content complete including citations and references. Two-column reading order somewhat mixed. Section headings rendered as paragraphs, not recovered as headings. Academic structure only partially preserved.
All text content extracted correctly. Table structure completely lost - rendered as paragraphs. No formatting preserved.
Complete text extraction. Numbered instructions preserved as text. Grid structure lost, ingredients merged into single paragraph. No inline formatting.
Excellent text extraction with bullets preserved as text. Section structure recognizable but no semantic elements. Minor formatting retained (bullets).
All text present and readable. Multi-column layout collapsed to linear paragraphs. No semantic structure or formatting recovered.
Complete text extraction. Some heading hierarchy detected (h2, h4). Code blocks not properly formatted (rendered as paragraphs). No monospace preservation.
Text and form field lines extracted. Checkbox glyphs preserved. No semantic form elements. Field structure present but not markup-based.
Perfect text extraction. Hanging indent structure entirely lost - flat paragraphs. No formatting recovered. Functional for bibliography extraction only.
Excellent text extraction, all components present in correct order. Letter structure recognizable through content sequencing. No semantic markup for letter parts.
Good text extraction with section numbers included. Title heading detected. Section hierarchy preserved in text. Bold terms not recovered as formatting.
All pages extracted with correct reading order. Headers and footers included in body content (not filtered). No page break semantics preserved.

Text mostly complete but missing italic/underline/code semantic markup. Superscript partially detected (E=mc²), subscript in H2O missing. Bold inconsistently applied (only first word). Most inline elements lost.
All caption text extracted correctly. No img tags or alignment attributes. Layout information completely absent. Pure text preservation only.
Complete text extraction including headers/footers. No structural distinction between header/footer/body. All content flattened to paragraphs. Repetition for each page captured.
Text and headings fully extracted. HR elements completely missing - no visual separators. Section headings not detected as such (rendered as paragraphs). Content order preserved.
Text extracted but sub/superscript numbers lost or rendered as plain text (H2O instead of H₂O). E=mc2 has superscript detected but inconsistently. Semantic markup missing.
Excellent text extraction including all contact details. Address elements recognized as separate structured lines. No semantic elements (address tag, links). Email and URLs as plain text.
All numeric values and currency fully extracted correctly. Table structure completely lost - rendered as flat paragraphs. Alignment (right-align) not recovered. Data accurate but unstructured.
Full-width headings correctly detected as h2. Column text present but reading order mixed. Multi-column layout information lost. Some structural detection of headings preserved.
RTL characters (Arabic, Hebrew) extracted correctly. No dir attribute for RTL sections. Mixed-direction text may have reading order issues. Characters preserved but direction metadata missing.
Text largely present but with structural simplification. Some h2 detection for title. Lists, tables, blockquotes, code rendered as paragraphs. Multi-column order mixed. Limited semantic preservation.
